metadata.title: AR Quick Look, meet Object Capture

abstract.text: Discover simple ways to bring your Object Capture assets to AR Quick Look while optimizing for visual quality and file size. Explore ways you can integrate AR Quick Look and Object Capture to help create entirely new experiences.

Discover the flexibility, versatility and power of Pixar‚Äôs Universal Scene Description (USD) for your 3D workflows. Learn how you can use the USD file format in your professional workflows for macOS: Scan 3D models of your real-world objects using Object Capture, utilize the potential of third-party digital content creation tools, and build high-quality rendered sequences.
Session notes shared by the community for the community.

doc://WWDCNotes/documentation/WWDCNotes/.title: Shop online with AR Quick Look

abstract.text: AR Quick Look adds a new dimension to online shopping: We‚Äôll show you how to easily showcase your products in augmented reality for a ‚Äútry before you buy‚Äù experience. Discover how to display a product banner in AR Quick Look, integrate Apple Pay, or display custom actions like ‚Äúadd to cart‚Äù.

Object Capture provides a quick and easy way to create lifelike 3D models of real-world objects using just a few images. Learn how you can get started and bring your assets to life with Photogrammetry for macOS. And discover best practices with object selection and image capture to help you achieve the highest-quality results.
